articles.content:
Researchers say they may have found a reason for a rare blood clotting condition that has occurred in some people who received the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine.
Anatolii Stepanov/AFP via Getty Image… [+3974 chars]
articles.description: A rare blood clotting condition has occurred in some people after receiving the AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine. If the new research is correct, it could mean that blood clots could be easily treated.
articles.title: European Scientists Zero In On AstraZeneca Blood Clot Link - NPR

articles.author: Frank Miles
articles.content: American whiskey has become collateral damage in Trump-era tariff disputes with Europe, and the business for distillers could become even more painful unless their entanglement in the trans-Atlantic … [+3101 chars]
articles.description: Bourbon, Tennessee whiskey and rye whiskey were left out of a recent breakthrough to start rebuilding trade relations between the U.S. and European Union in the wake of Donald Trump's presidency. While tariffs were suspended on some spirits, the EU's 25% tari…
articles.title: Whiskey Sour? Makers face hangover from trade dispute - Fox Business
